select b.attendant_id as 'attendantId',sum(b.number) as 'number',c.id as 'goodId' ,c.name as 'goodName',c.url as 'imgUrl',d.caught_people_id from tb_user_produce a join tb_produce b on a.produce_id = b.id join tb_goods c on b.good_id = c.id join tb_attendant_user d on b.attendant_id = d.attendant_id where a.user_id= #{userId} group by b.attendant_id,d.caught_people_id,c.id
